MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault.  We are sorry we can't give you a time of restoration at present.  If you wish to call back later we will be able to give you more information.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL28 postcode area ofColwyn Bay, affecting properties in Brymbo and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:45pm. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate the cause of the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:03pm on 15th November 2020
